verses.roman:
mṛgī-vyādhite āmi kabhu ha-i acetana
ei cāri dayā kari' karena pālana

synonyms: mṛgī-vyādhite—due to epilepsy; āmi—I; kabhu—sometimes; ha-i—become; acetana—unconscious; ei cāri—these four men; dayā kari'-being merciful; karena pālana—maintain Me.
translation: "Due to epilepsy, I sometimes fall unconscious. Out of their mercy, these four men maintain Me."
